name: Surf Handplane / Handboard Only
description:
Our original recycled plastic handplane for bodysurfing.

Its a quality tool, designed and made here in the UK from recycled plastic. You benefit from near neutral buoyancy meaning it's easy to swim with and planes like a dream. Being plastic maintenance is minimal with no need to oil or wax to keep it in tip top condition.

Made from a select grade of recycled plastic this is a trick piece of kit. The plastic is a sandwich of 2 colours which looks great with the channels and logo cut into it.

Ergonomic off centre grip helps position your hand for both left and right drops.

Size is circa 30cm x 17cm.

Holes ready for a leash of your choice.

Ready to surf, easy to travel with, no baggage issues grab your flippers, hand plane and get wet!

For overseas shipping please contact us before ordering.

name: Surf Handplane / Handboard Package
description:
Why buy a Hityo Surf Handplane?

Its a quality tool, designed and made here in the UK from recycled plastic. You benefit from near neutral buoyancy  meaning it's easy to swim with and planes like a dream. Being plastic maintenance is minimal with no need to oil or wax to keep it in tip top condition.

Made from a select grade of recycled plastic this is a trick piece of kit. The plastic is a sandwich of 2 colours which looks great with the channels and logo cut into it.

Ergonomic off centre grip helps position your hand for both left and right drops.

Holes ready for a leash of your choice.

Ready to surf, easy to travel with, no baggage issues grab your flippers, hand plane and get wet!

Complete with bag and Hityo sticker for your ride - just add fins & neoprene!

Size is circa 30cm x 17cm.

For overseas shipping please contact us before ordering.
